title: Dinosaur-era pterosaurs cut down in their prime, new fossils show
text:
Dinosaur-era pterosaurs cut down in their prime, new fossils show 12:33pm EDT - 01:32 
Pterosaurs - huge flying reptiles - were long thought to be in decline at the time the dinosaurs went extinct, but were actually diversifying and thriving, according to new fossil evidence.   
Pterosaurs - huge flying reptiles - were long thought to be in decline at the time the dinosaurs went extinct, but were actually diversifying and thriving, according to new fossil evidence.  //reut.rs/2In0Oue
